 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעַז‎</span>] **verb** ==talk indistinctly, unintelligibly== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, in derivatives (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעַז‎</span> ***foreign language***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעוּז‎</span> ***foreigner***), also ***murmur, remonstrate***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***talk indistinctly***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***distort***; IV. ***talk obscurely, ambiguously***); — only **Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם לֹעֵז‎</span> [[Ps.114.1|Ps 114:1]] ***a people talking unintelligibly*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְרַיִם‎</span>).
